title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set grouping usability enhancements
description:
This feature aims to improve the user experience for reviewing and grouping related items in the eDiscovery (Premium) review sets. It includes a new interface for grouping family items for emails, documents, conversations, and attachments. It also includes a new interface for reviewing duplicates and related items together on a single page.
GA date: March CY2023
